title: ICE when casting &mut Trait to *mut Trait, same for casting &Trait to *const Trait

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
```
trait Trait { }

fn function(t: &mut Trait) {
    t as *mut Trait
}

fn main() { }
```

This ICEs with the following message:

```
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc a.rs 
a.rs:4:5: 4:6 error: internal compiler error: expected object type
a.rs:4     t as *mut Trait
           ^
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
```
